patthana15.23:1.1: Sahetukaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana15.23:2.1: Sahetukaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.23:3.1: Ahetukaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naahetuko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
